attributes.action: Stop Rationing Of Blood Testing Strips For Diabetics
attributes.additional_details: Stop diabetics being put at risk because vital blood test strips are being rationed by the NHS. When diabetes is improperly manged in the short term lead to Diabetic ketoacidosis and in the long tem lead to an increased risk od Cardiovascular disease,  blindness, nerve damage (neuropathy) and kidney disease (NEPHROPATHY)
